text: Zambia has been in 10 Summer Olympic Games. They have never been in the Winter Olympic Games. They competed before as Northern Rhodesia. == Medalists == Medal Name Games Sport Event Keith Mwila 1984 Los Angeles Boxing Light Flyweight Samuel Matete 1996 Atlanta Athletics Men's 400 metres Hurdles ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * * Zambia profile at London2012.com Category:National sports teams of Zambia Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Zambia at the Olympics
